title: The discrimination about Elo
body: I know the lol community is really young but why so much people get arrogant about elo. Its like being ''low elo'' was saying you were someone inferior. Well yeah it is but only on a game. Come on guy. Keep this game just a game!

replies.body: Play to win and it's not just a game anymore...

Low elo
High elo. 

Good
Bad.. 

Inside No. 6
Living in West District.. 
(Anime Reference)

Why is everything so black and white with people? 

If we just tear down these walls everything would be better.

Low elo= People who dont understand simple game basics
High Elo= People who think they know simple game basics
True high elo D1+ = People who know truly know the game

> [{quoted}](name=YamiNoHikari,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zoqAl9Fy,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-28T01:05:24.892+0000)
>
> Low elo= People who dont understand simple game basics
> High Elo= People who think they know simple game basics
> True high elo D1+ = People who know truly know the game

Sounds like low elo is extremely easy....Are normals usually filled with silver/gold players?
I don't think its a story of knowledge. I personnally understand the game a lot and i suck. Don't have the reflexe to play corectly. I think it's more about skill.
The point is people get a supperiority complexe about elo. I had a friend who don't want to play with me because Im silver 4. There is a problem somewhere here.
I mean I hate playing with bronze 5's, because i dont find enjoyment just auto winning the game, people play league and want somewhat of a challenge (Despite what they say its true).
If they want so much a challenge. Why do they rage when they lost thos ''challenge'' blaming everyone.
I think its just purely arrogance
Well not all of the player. I think you know what i mean
Well low elo is inferior to high elo :o which you agreed up above, so whats the debate O_o
